idea:
Techsevin is an end to end digital commerce agency recognised globally, with offices in Kuwait and India. With a team of 60+ Ecommerce / Magento / Shopify technophiles who have achieved awards of excellence in diversified areas of expertise. We believe in creating enthralling digital commerce experiences by leveraging superpowers of Magento for our clients.


With 8+ years in this business and the founders working in the Indian and Middle Eastern eCommerce industry since 16+ years have delivered 100+ successful small/large eCommerce projects. With our experience and expertise, we can create an effective, tailored, well-crafted result for your brand, too.


At Techsevin, we have always believed in delivering the very best Digital Commerce solutions we conceivably can to our clients.
name: TECHSEVIN SOLUTION LLP

idea:

idea:
Orchestrade Tecnologies Pvt Ltd and its trademark brand "TradeBridge" is a full stack, algorithm-driven, B2B e-marketplace catering to the non-perishable Agro-Commodity market. It provides farmers, processors & importers seamless access to millions of retailers & wholesalers across India with a single click of a button, thereby eliminating multiple layers of middlemen.
TradeBridge aims to bridge the information asymmetry and lack of accountability in agricultural commodities trading. It provides farmers & small businesses with the ability to access markets and mandis across the country including Tier 2/3 cities, dictate pricing and hence obtain higher realizations with enhanced working capital capabilities. It also provides retailers with a platform to source directly from the farm level though a robust and secure supply chain.
TradeBridge leverages innovative technology to source produce from farmers and delivers them to retailers within 12 hours, via robust logistic tie-ups and provides the ecosystem with credit, insurance, warehousing & real time market data
name: Orchestrade Technologies
